name: YogsGiving (RachaelV)
description:
Similar to a "Friendsgiving" celebration, various members of the Yogscast are meeting together to  celebrate the upcoming end of another successful Jingle Jam. Unfortunately,  some of the money the group was going to donate last minute has been misplaced around the building. Now, Leo is going to  look around each floor on her way up the to YogStudios, searching for their misplaced donations.  How much money will they ultimately be able to donate?

This was my first time using all of the following software resources, so I'm pretty happy with how much I learned from this game jam!

Software Used: GameMaker Studio 2, Piskel (Pixel Art & Animation) , and PulseBoy (Music)

Art, Animation, Music, Programming, and Design by Rachael V

Opensource Office Art via:  https://opengameart.org/content/office-space-tileset
